Activities commonly implemented under this intervention

Construct and/or upgrade roads between production, processing, and market areas.
Improve transport and storage capacity.
Construct and/or upgrade processing plants, slaughterhouses, dairy processing, and (wet) markets.

Guidance for increased environmental sustainability

P6. Improve access to energy-efficient storage, processing, transportation, and refrigeration equipment to minimize loss and waste as well as enhance food safety. Integrate energy-efficient machinery and equipment into the technical design and financial analyses. IEE 2007.
P6 P7. Support investment in renewable energy production: technical assistance, subsidies (e.g., matching grants, soft loans), and energy pricing. IEE 2007.
P5. Develop comprehensive waste management plans: waste stream minimization, waste collection, storage, processing, and discharge/recycling.
